header.brandAlt: Crane logo with the text: Beneath the Surface
header.blurb: We exist to call and equip God's people to pray for spiritual breakthrough in Japan.

order.title: Order the English booklet
order.warning: We're only able to ship within Japan at this time.

response.title: Responding in prayer
response.blurb: We invite you to respond to this topic in a few ways. Listen to and pray along with a local believer's prayer for this topic, and then lift up your own prayer of faith to God. Download the prayer points and share them with others. Share your reflections from your time of prayer with us.
response.feedbackBlurb: We'd love to hear from you.
